page.title: 09Our Own School (continued)
page.content: When you go through the main entrance at the front of the building, you go past the offices of the headmistress and the secretary. Then you are in the main corridor. To the left is the stock room, staff toilets, library, welfare room and the dining room. To the right is the security cupboard, staff room, infants' toilets, door to the playground, 3 infants' classrooms and the caretaker's room. This is the old part of the school. Opposite the dining room door is the beginning of the new school buildings. There is the hall, a separate nursery unit, and a block of 4 classrooms. Each pair of junior classrooms has an art area, a stock cupboard, an extra room and toilets. At the back of the school is a large field surrounded by trees and a fence. There is a brick adventure wall and a wild garden area.
